title: Post-Draft Strategy, Special Guest Luke Combs
description:
Field Yates, Mike Clay and Daniel Dopp talk managing your post-draft team for Week 1, before Eric Moody joins to discuss who you should stash on your roster. Then, special guest Luke Combs hops on the pod to talk his fantasy draft results and tour.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

itunes:subtitle: Fantasy Focus: So You Drafted...Now What? Plus, Special Guest Luke Combs
